verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* yourselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w befall|strong="H7122"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*:

Ruben, my \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, thou art my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H7205"\w* \w the|strong="H7205"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1060"\w* my sorrow: excelling \w in|strong="H1060"\w* gifts, greater \w in|strong="H1060"\w* command.

Thou art poured \w out|strong="H4325"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* thou \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou wentest \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* didst \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w couch|strong="H3326"\w*.
\w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* iniquity, waging war.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fury \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* selfwill \w they|strong="H3588"\w* undermined \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wall.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w fury|strong="H5678"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w stubborn|strong="H7185"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w cruel|strong="H7185"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w them|strong="H0779"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* \w them|strong="H0779"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Juda, thee \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w*: thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w necks|strong="H6203"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* thee.

Juda \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w lion’s|strong="H0738"\w* \w whelp|strong="H1482"\w*: \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, thou art \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: resting thou hast couched \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rouse|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* sceptre \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* Juda, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* ruler \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* thigh, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sent, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* expectation \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

Tying \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w foal|strong="H5895"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* vineyard, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* ass, O my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*. \w He|strong="H1818"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w grape|strong="H6025"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* more beautiful than \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5869"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* whiter than \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.

Zabulon \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* shore, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* road \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*, reaching as \w far|strong="H5921"\w* as \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*.

\w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* shall be \w a|strong="H0996"\w* \w strong|strong="H1634"\w* ass \w lying|strong="H7257"\w* \w down|strong="H7257"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* borders.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* excellent: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w bowed|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w carry|strong="H5445"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w servant|strong="H5647"\w* under \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*.

\w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w snake|strong="H5175"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w*, \w that|strong="H5307"\w* biteth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* horse’s \w heels|strong="H6119"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*.
\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H6960"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, being girded, \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* fight before \w him|strong="H1931"\w*: \w and|strong="H1410"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* girded backward.

Aser, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* fat, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w dainties|strong="H4574"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

Nephtali, \w a|strong="H5414"\w* hart \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w loose|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H0561"\w* beauty.

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* growing \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* growing \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* comely \w to|strong="H5921"\w* behold; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w run|strong="H6805"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* fro \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H7791"\w*.
But they \w that|strong="H2671"\w* held darts provoked him, \w and|strong="H2671"\w* quarrelled \w with|strong="H4843"\w* him, \w and|strong="H2671"\w* envied him.

\w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* rested \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* strong, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* bands \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* loosed, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0046"\w* \w one|strong="H0046"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: thence \w he|strong="H8033"\w* came forth \w a|strong="H8033"\w* pastor, \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* thy \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w that|strong="H8415"\w* lieth \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w womb|strong="H7356"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w are|strong="H0001"\w* strengthened \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* desire \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w should|strong="H0001"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*; \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H6936"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Nazarite \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* \w ravenous|strong="H2963"\w* \w wolf|strong="H2061"\w*, \w in|strong="H2963"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w prey|strong="H5706"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H2963"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* shall \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w*, \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* proper \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w now|strong="H0589"\w* going \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0001"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* double \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite,

\w Over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Mambre \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* bury \w in|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* Sara \w his|strong="H3327"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w with|strong="H0802"\w* Rebecca \w his|strong="H3327"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* Lia doth lie \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* ended \w the|strong="H0853"\w* commandments, wherewith \w he|strong="H0834"\w* instructed \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* drew \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* feet upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* died: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*.
